name: Ianah
wishText: I chose this image of yours kasi sobrang cute mo talaga dito HAHAHAHAHA. I feel sad lang din kasi hindi man lang kita nabigyan ng actual gift this Valentine's Day. Ginawa ko to para kahit sa ganitong paraan makabawi man lang ako sayo today and babawi rin talaga ako someday. For now, eto lang muna kaya kong ibigay sa'yo. A short message that I coded and spent days and nights para lang may something ako for you noh 'di naman pwedeng wala akong ipakita man lang sayo kahit message na ganito. Thank you for the fun times and thank you for accepting me the way I am. Yun yung rason kung bakit sobrang attached ng feelings ko sa'yo ever since. I'm not a fan of long messages but I am a #1 fan of yours, eme HAHAHAHA kidding aside pero I think may ihahaba pa 'to pero hindi ko na pahahabain pa. This month is your busy month yun ang ika mo sa'kin, so goodluck sa studies mo okay? Keep doing great po!! I love you so much and Happy Valentine's day, Love. <33
